titles: London undone; or, A reflection upon the late disasterous fire.
publisher: Printed by E[llen]. C[otes]. for H[enry]. Eversden, and H[enry]. Brome,
notes: Verse: "No more historians your surmise recant,".
In two columns, bordered in black.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
